name: Dorothy I. DEPPEN and Kenneth L. Deppen, her husband, Appellants, v. William J. SAVORY, M.D., Bernard W. Juvelier, M.D. and Harrisburg Hospital, Appellees

judges: MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as senior justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800 due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J.; see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: Dorothy I. DEPPEN and Kenneth L. Deppen, her husband, Appellants, v. William J. SAVORY, M.D., Bernard W. Juvelier, M.D. and Harrisburg Hospital, Appellees.

opinions.text:
JURISDICTIONAL STATEMENT
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of JUNE 8,1994, the appeal in the above captioned matter is quashed.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as senior justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800 due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J.; see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
641 A.2d 581
Dorothy I. DEPPEN and Kenneth L. Deppen, her husband, Appellants, v. William J. SAVORY, M.D., Bernard W. Juvelier, M.D. and Harrisburg Hospital, Appellees.
No. 42 Middle District Appeal Docket 1994.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 8, 1994.
